characters.name: Johnny Kage
characters.description: He is an action movie star with an extensive martial arts background.

characters.name: Sonya Blade
characters.description: She is a military officer with the Special Forces.

characters.name: Raiden
characters.description: The god of thunder who possesses control over lightning.

characters.name: Sub-Zero
characters.description: A warrior from the Lin Kuei clan, he is principally defined by his ability to control ice in many forms.

characters.name: Scorpion
characters.description: An undead ninja, he is principally defined by his quest to avenge the deaths of himself, his family, and his clan. His primary weapon is a kunai spear.

characters.name: Reptile
characters.description: He is a Saurian, a species of reptilian humanoids and one of the last surviving members of his race.

characters.name: Shang Tsung
characters.description: A powerful sorcerer, he is principally defined by his abilities to shapeshift into other characters and to absorb the souls of defeated warriors.

characters.name: Shao Kahn
characters.description: The emperor of the realm of Outworld, he is feared for his immense strength, and knowledge of black magic, Shao Kahn seeks conquest of all the realms, including Earth

characters.name: Kitana
characters.description: She is a 10,000 year old assassin and stepdaughter of Shao Kahn from the realm of Edenia

characters.name: Mileena
characters.description: The biological twin sister of Kitana and daughter of Sindel, and heir to the throne. However, she was infected with the Tarkatan virus and wears a veil to conceil her face.
